       <div id="wrapbox10341413">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10341413">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10341413">
          <div class="bi_books">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Histology and Pathology Books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_14" id="content10341413">
          <div id="boxatt10341413" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <div id="book3104116" class="book_div">
             <div class="book_cover">
              <img alt="Cover Art" src="http://syndetics.com/index.aspx?isbn=9780443068508/LC.GIF&amp;client=springshare" title="Wheater's Functional Histology" class="book_art_0" style="display:block;" />
             </div>
             <span class="book_title">
              Wheater's Functional Histology
             </span>
             <span class="book_author">
              - Barbara Young; Alan Stevens; James S. Lowe; John W. Heath; Philip J. Deakin
             </span>
             <div class="book_isbn">
              ISBN: 9780443068508
             </div>
             <div class="book_pubyear">
              Publication Date: 2006-03-14
             </div>
            </div>
            <br style="clear:both;" />
            <div id="book3104095" class="book_div">
             <div class="book_cover">
              <img alt="Cover Art" src="http://syndetics.com/index.aspx?isbn=9780781772211/LC.GIF&amp;client=springshare" title="Histology" class="book_art_0" style="display:block;" />
             </div>
             <span class="book_title">
              Histology
             </span>
             <span class="book_author">
              - Wojciech Pawlina; Michael R. Ross
             </span>
             <div class="book_isbn">
              ISBN: 9780781772211
             </div>
             <div class="book_pubyear">
              Publication Date: 2006-07-18
             </div>
            </div>
            <br style="clear:both;" />
            <div id="book3104084" class="book_div">
             <div class="book_cover">
              <a id="book_3104084" href="http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/0838513824" target="_blank">
               <img alt="Cover Art" src="http://images.amazon.com/images/P/0838513824.jpg" title="Color Atlas of Basic Histopathology" class="book_art_0" style="display:block;" />
              </a>
             </div>
             <span class="book_title">
              Color Atlas of Basic Histopathology
             </span>
             <span class="book_author">
              - Clara Milikowski; Irwin Berman
             </span>
             <div class="book_isbn">
              ISBN: 0838513824
             </div>
             <div class="book_pubyear">
              Publication Date: 1996-12-05
             </div>
            </div>
            <br style="clear:both;" />
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>

     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10100862">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10100862">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10100862">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Histology and Pathology Image Websites and Portals
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10100862">
          <div id="boxatt10100862" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12286522">
              <a id="link_12286522" href="http://www.path.uiowa.edu/virtualslidebox/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12286522,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Biology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Histology, Pathology, and Other Images'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286522}); ">
               Medical Images: Virtual Slidebox, University of Iowa
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Images of Histology slides from the University of Iowa
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12286543">
              <a id="link_12286543" href="http://guides.mclibrary.duke.edu/images" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12286543,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Biology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Histology, Pathology, and Other Images'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286543}); ">
               Medical Images; Duke University Medical Center Library
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subject guide providing links to medical image Web sites
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12286563">
              <a id="link_12286563" href="http://library.med.utah.edu/WebPath/webpath.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12286563,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Biology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Histology, Pathology, and Other Images'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286563}); ">
               The Internet Pathology Laboratory
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Pathology images on the web
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12576685">
              <a id="link_12576685" href="https://histo.life.illinois.edu/histo/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12576685,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Biology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Histology, Pathology, and Other Images'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12576685}); ">
               Atlas of Histology from College of Medicine, UIUC
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Labeled histological images with functional descriptions
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12576729">
              <a id="link_12576729" href="http://www.cellimagelibrary.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12576729,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Biology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Histology, Pathology, and Other Images'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12576729}); ">
               The Cell: An Image Library
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               From the American Society of Cell Biology, The Cell: An Image Libraryâ„¢ is a free, searchable, public repository of annotated images from a variety of organisms focusing on cell architecture, intracellular functionalities, and both normal and abnormal processes.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link15836018">
              <a id="link_15836018" href="http://www.siumed.edu/~dking2/index.htm" target="_blank" onclick="hit(15836018,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Biology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Histology, Pathology, and Other Images'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 15836018}); ">
               Histology at Southern Illinois University
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A website with introductory histology slides
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>

     </div>
     <div class="popup_body">
      <div id="popupinfocontent" style="display:inline;">
       <img alt="Loading" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/indicator.gif" />
       &nbsp; Loading...
      </div>

       <a href="#" onclick="hideAlert('popupinfo'); return false;">
        Close
       </a>
      </center>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
  </div>
  <div id="dp" style="width:850px;">
   &nbsp;
  </div>

   cssdropdown.startchrome("tabs12");
  </script>

                        st_type : content_config.hitsource,
